unwrap3D.Parameters package

Submodules

unwrap3D.Parameters.params module

This module generates some general default parameter settings to help get started with certain functions with many parameters

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.affine_register_matlab()[source]

specify parameters for running Matlab imregtform to do Affine registration

see unwrap3D.Registration.registration.matlab_affine_register() for registering two timepoints and

see unwrap3D.Registration.registration.matlab_group_register_batch() for registering a video with switching of reference images.

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.demons_register_matlab()[source]

specify parameters for running Matlab imregdemons to do Demon’s registration

see unwrap3D.Registration.registration.nonregister_3D_demons_matlab()

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.evolutionary_affine_reg()[source]

parameters for affine registration using simpleITK using Evolutionary optimizer

see unwrap3D.Registration.registration.SITK_multiscale_affine_registration()

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.farneback2D_optical_flow()[source]

parameters for extracting optical flow using Farneback method

see unwrap3D.Tracking.tracking.Eval_dense_optic_flow()

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.gradient_descent_affine_reg()[source]

parameters for affine registration using simpleITK using Gradient Descent optimizer

see unwrap3D.Registration.registration.SITK_multiscale_affine_registration()

unwrap3D.Parameters.params.optimesh_relaxation_config()[source]

parameters for doing CVT relaxation of meshes using the optimesh library

see https://pypi.org/project/optimesh/
